item.title: Plug Power Plans To Increase Its Authorized Common Stock To 3 Billion
item.description: The company will ask shareholders to approve a charter amendment to double its authorized common stock from 1.5 billion to 3.0 billion shares.

item.title: HeartBeam Stock Slumps After FDA Refuses Clearance For ECG Software
item.description: The company said it will work with the agency to reach a resolution and expressed confidence in its clinical data.

item.title: MFI Stock Doubles On BTC Pivot Amid Pressure On Digital Asset Treasury Valuations Amid Crypto Sell-Off
item.description: MFI announces $500 million PIPE to support Bitcoin-backed digital asset strategy.

item.title: Meme Stocks And Retail Favorites Come Under Pressure As Wall Street Remains Cautious
item.description: Many of these meme stocks have fared far worse than the Russell 2000 index.

item.title: CRML Stock In Spotlight After Securing $20M Stockpile Of UHP Copper Powder
item.description: CRML acquired the resource from Swiss Commodity RE in an all-share transaction priced at $10 per share.
